prev.excerpt:
There are  a lot  of VIM plugins to choose from. An individual's list of what
would be considered "essential" is largely a personal matter. For any given

fields.title: 5 Essential VIM Plugins That Greatly Increase my Productivity

next.excerpt:
Vim Adventures  is a fun browser based game that
teaches basic VIM skills while adventuring. It is kind of silly, and can be a
bit... frustrating... but that is the point. This is VIM after all! No pain, no
gain ;)

fields.title: VIM Adventures: A Fun Way to Pick up Some Basic Skills
